snippet.title: Mystic Inn - Week 50
snippet.description:
This is the last level.

Week 36 and this level were impossible to beat Expert goal without triple magic potion.
I used that at the end of the level, when I started to collect magic spheres on all tables.

Potion is rechargeable by replaying the potion level.
However, potion levels become unavailable after beating the game.
(I already used triple magic potion in my first try, so I couldn't make more)


Empty bar bonus and chaining bonus are the most important.
Keep the bar empty to earn additional 150 points.
If you let dragons steal a potion, this bonus will be nullified in that level.
All chaining except menu reading gives additional 150 points.
